name: absorbable

An absorbable substance can be absorbed, especially by the body: Fizzy drinks provide readily absorbable sugar and lead to a rapid increase in glucose levels. Cooking makes nutrients like beta-carotene and lycopene more absorbable. They knew that some dangerous gases were absorbable through the skin. Related word

More examplesFewer examplesThey changed her nutritional supplement to one with a more absorbable form of iron.The wound is sutured with absorbable material.Though not absorbable through the skin, lead and other heavy metals can be vaporized and breathed in as a particulate dust.The absorbable stent is composed of a biodegradable polyester that slowly releases the drug.Instantly absorbable, this cream will leave your hands feeling fresh and fragrant.
